Reading list (for technology review)


The following is Blockchain white papers and technical papers.


Blockchain finance and supply-chain




On the Feasibility of Decentralized Derivatives Markets, Shayan Eskandari, Jeremy Clark, Vignesh Sundaresan, and Moe Adham


Toward Cryptocurrency Lending, Mildred Chidinma Okoye, and Jeremy Clark


Escrow protocols for cryptocurrencies: How to buy physical goods using Bitcoin, Steven Goldfeder, Joseph Bonneau, Rosario Gennaro, and Arvind Narayanan


Prediction Markets and Real World Data Feeds (Textbook, Sec. 9.5)


CoC: Secure Supply Chain Management System based on Public Ledger, Lei Xu, Lin Chen, Zhimin Gao, Yang Lu, and Weidong Shi




Blockchain and InfoSec infrastructure




Decentralizing Privacy: Using Blockchain to Protect Personal Data, Guy Zyskind, etc


Securing healthcare it infrastructure with blockchain and modern cryptography, Yan Huang, Haixu Tang
